page.title: netPanzer - An Online Multiplayer Tactical Warfare Game

section.title: Join Us!
section.p: The first goal to port netPanzer to GNU/Linux is done, now its time to extent, fix and cleanup netPanzer. So if you want to help there or at other topics, you are more than welcome. Simply write a mail to netPanzer-Devel for more informations.

dl.dd: To see the collection of prior posting to the list, visit the netpanzer-devel archives
To post a message to all the list members, send email to netpanzer-devel@lists.berlios.de
